title: An unexpected error has occurred BUG / PROBLEM
body: When i sign in or go to my match history / profile stats the pop up comes up saying https://gyazo.com/102d78a3d68e8a2bd0c47ba0cb95259f havent tryed to play a game yet so i dont know if its just an annoying bug or f it hinders many things on the client.

replies.body: I got it like 3 times in around 5 minutes when I browse the League client. Don't know what it's about.

It happened to me as well!! Whenever I sign in/check my profile that error stuff will pop out. And when try to start a custom game, the game will crush and it says "The application was unable to start correctly (0*000007b). I just got my new allienware with win10 today so I think it must be my laptop's problem. However I've got all the direct/net frame stuff and I've updated my adapter driver. I have tried downloading the whole game again and used that client repair option.  So can someone plz help me out with this mess ;(
when i sign in to my second account it dosent pop up does this make it a server issue and some of my friends have it and some dont.
